EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 160 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hello Mike, I hope you are doing well. I wanted to follow up on the email I sent below. Are you still interested in learning about MBO Partners at this time?Best Regards,Emily ___________________________________Emily StringerConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6282f: 703.793.6457e: estringer@mbopartners.com <estringer@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=stringer> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. From: Emily Stringer Sent: Tuesday, January 14, 2014 3:30 PM To: 'michel.mike.aube@gmail.com' Subject: Welcome to MBO Partners Dear Mike, Thank you for the inquiry you submitted at the MBO Partners website. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here. <https://my.timedriver.com/PK2TP+> You can watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. You can learn more about how MBO works by clicking here <http://www.mbopartners.com/how-mbo-works>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Emily ___________________________________EMILY STRINGERConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6282f: 703.793.6457e: estringer@mbopartners.com <mailto:estringer@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed.
